entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is the pet rat of Ron Weasley, described as being kicked by Harry Potter.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is a cat and the pet of Hermione Granger, described as being kicked at by Scabbers.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, described as hopping up and down in pain after the trunk was knocked over.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, described as kicking Scabbers by mistake.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is the uncle of Harry Potter, described as owning socks that contain a Pocket Sneakoscope.

entities.name: pocket sneakoscope
entities.description: The Pocket Sneakoscope is an object that detects and warns against danger, described as becoming dislodged from Uncle Vernon's socks.

relationships.description: Scabbers kicked at Crookshanks by mistake, causing the cat's fur to stand on end.
Harry Potter found the Pocket Sneakoscope on the floor after it became dislodged from Uncle Vernon's socks.
